failure_modes.name: Model Drift
failure_modes.trigger: Data distribution shift or concept drift
failure_modes.detection_method: Drift monitoring, ECE tracking, baseline comparison
failure_modes.mitigation: Automatic auto-mode disable, incident report, retraining trigger

failure_modes.name: Calibration Failure
failure_modes.detection_method: ECE computation, Brier score, calibration histogram

failure_modes.name: Adversarial Attack
failure_modes.trigger: Malicious input designed to evade detection
failure_modes.mitigation: Robustness testing, input sanitization, consensus mode

failure_modes.name: Checkpoint Corruption
failure_modes.detection_method: SHA256 verification, atomic save, replay test
failure_modes.mitigation: Atomic writes, backup checkpoints, integrity checks

failure_modes.name: GPU Thermal Throttle
failure_modes.mitigation: Automatic pause, cooldown period, batch reduction

failure_modes.name: Dependency Vulnerability
failure_modes.detection_method: Hash monitoring, version tracking, CVE alerts
failure_modes.mitigation: Pinned versions, security scanning, update policy

failure_modes.name: Operator Override Abuse
failure_modes.mitigation: Two-person rule, GPG verification, abuse detection

failure_modes.name: Decision Hallucination
failure_modes.trigger: High entropy, low confidence, model uncertainty
failure_modes.mitigation: Prefer abstention over error, human review required
